---
title: "Subsetting"
author: "Juhong Park"
---

# Vector Subsetting
```{r}
x <- 1:4
x
x[1]
x[1:3]
x[x>2]
logicalX <- x>2
logicalX
x[logicalX]
```

# List Subsetting
```{r}
x <- list(seq=1:4, pi=3.14, author="Juhong Park")
x[1]
x[[1]]
x$seq
x["seq"]
x[["seq"]]
x[c(1, 3)]
x[[c(1, 3)]]
x[[1]][[3]]
name <- "author"
x[[name]]
x$name
```

### Partial Matching
```{r}
x$a
x[["a"]]
x[["a", exact=FALSE]]
```

# Matrix Subsetting
```{r}
x <- matrix(1:12, 3, 4)
x
x[2, 3]
x[2, 3, drop=FALSE]
x[2,]
x[,2]
x[,2, drop=FALSE]
```

# NA Removing
```{r}
x <- c(1, NA, 3, NA, 5)
y <- c("One", NA, NA, "Four", "Five")
na <- is.na(x)
x[!na]
notNa <- complete.cases(x, y)
x[notNa]
y[notNa]
df <- data.frame(num=1:3, word=c(NA, "Five", NA))
df
notNa <- complete.cases(df)
notNa
df[notNa,]
```
